name: Bomber Dice
description:
This is Bomber Dice, a game made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam. In this casual game the player will control a dice (with cannons!) to try to survive against other dice (with cannons as well!) and get the most amount of points possible. 

The amount of points on each side determines the shooting range! 

We hope you have fun!

Controls:
Movement (towards the camera) 

W -> Forward
A -> Left
S -> Backwards
D -> Right
Q -> Rotate Camera Left
E -> Rotate Camera Right
